metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29932 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
llvm-project commit fdbc55a5 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault via the component mlir::IROperand<mlir::OpOperand.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29932` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

clang-13 - 1:13.0.1-11ubuntu14.1
clang-13-examples - 1:13.0.1-11ubuntu14.1
clang-format-13 - 1:13.0.1-11ubuntu14.1
clang-tidy-13 - 1:13.0.1-11ubuntu14.1

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-13 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:13.0.1-11ubuntu14.1').
llvm-toolchain-14 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:14.0.6-12ubuntu0.23.04.1').
llvm-toolchain-15 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:15.0.7-3ubuntu0.23.04.1').
